Html:
first, very nice product!

Only for clarification:

Irony.net will parse and create a AST for my new language.
Than I can use this AST and transform  it to DLR.AST.

Than DLR will write than my byte code.

Is that correct?

Will this work?

regards
Wolfram

yep, that will work. There was another project with this plan - google "IronLua".
good luck.
